reviews.review: Zombies and a lot of time admiring Alyx's new model
Not as good as Half life 2 but still really good! 9.8/10

Still waiting for Half Life 3, but in the meantime Half Life 2 Episodes 1 and 2 fill a satisfying gap in the story. Episode 1 sees Alyx and "the one free man" rising from the ashes of City 17. Together they must escape before the Citidel's energy core goes critical.

Fighting through the Citidel, streets, fortifications, a creepy hospital and a train station, the duo must help other citizens before making their own escape.

An enjoyable episode with some awkward 'chieves and another cliffhanger ending.
Dans cet épisode il faut à tout prix fuir Cité 17 avant sa destruction imminente ! Très bon jeu malgré sa durée de vie très courte comparé à Half Life 2.
Классная игра, но намного короче той полноценной 2 части. И где же 3 ЧАСТЬ???!!!

Centrado en el escape que Gordon y Alyx deben llevar a cabo de cuidad 17, luego de los hechos ocurridos anteriormente, hasta poder llegar a las afueras de la misma. Necesario de jugar para seguir la trama de esta gran historia.
A bit disappointing, but still great fun
You pretty much have to play it.
Not as good as Half Life 2, but you should probably play it instead of going straight to Episode 2
Very Good Epsiode. Hope the Episode 2 is AWSOME Then Episode 1.

Я очень доволен игрой. Episode one - на мой взгляд, самая завораживающая из всей серии игра, в которой нам преподносится возможность окунуться в атмосферу страха и ожидания неизбежного, которая царит в разваливающемся Сити-17. В игре хватает хоррора, да и сама обстановка гнетёт и не отпускает до самого конца. келли Бейли и на сей раз оправдал себя. Музыка чертовски хорошо вписывается в атмосферу игры. Я с удовольствием прохожу эту игру снова и снова.

It's a legenday game.
PLAY IT.

Score : 8/10

Following on excellently from HL2, and the exact same atmosphere still inducing shivers up the spine, this acts as the epilogue to the events of Nova Prospekt and City 17. Perhaps some areas were lacking in the way they failed to introduce a new aspect to the equation (judging how much of it is similar to the street combat from the previous), however the venturing into the dark underground, into the core of the citadel and outside City 17 really summarises the past story arc, and beautifully permits continuity for the next chapter of the story against the combine. Really, HL2 cannot be completed without this episode.
вааще норм игруха срочно иди играй!!!

Да, это продолжение долгожданной первой части Половины жизни, Короткая, но весьма втягивающая в атмосферу жизни SiTi 17. Аликс Венкс, вас до конца ведёт к выживанию. Сюжет полный неожиданностей, вас радует, разнообразием, и держит под впечатлением. Valve  как всегда на высоте, и знает что вы хотите увидеть в этом мире приключений!
Despues de desactivar el nucleo a huir de ciudad 17

A key chapter in the Half Life story but completely forgettable on its own. More Half Life 2 is always welcome though.

A great new sequel to the already awesome Half-Life series, this game is action packed from start to finish. I highly recommend it, but this game does lack a long campaign. It is short enough to finish in one night; not reccomended for gamers who like longer level designs.
Jogo foda!
... duh.
Excellent addition to my favorite! Incredible bit of story to get through, and the achievement hunting is fun! Absolutely loved the small changes and additions to the game.
Bela continuação para o Eterno GOTY!

Un poco mas interesante que HL2, al final tiende la trama a añadir mas entretenimiento.
Recomendado ;)

Half-Life 2: Episode One continues the story of the Half-Life franchise exactly where Half-Life 2 left it. It keeps everything that made Half-Life 2 good, although in a much shorter game.

It's basically a continuation of the Half-Life 2 story, and it does a great job at it. However, this game has you travelling through the ruins of City 17 along with Alyx, with opens the doors to new gameplay mechanics.

I don't know what more could I say, except that you should get it.
Yes.

More Half - Life just too short, Good for a new chapter in the HL2 family. The leading characters along your journey show more personality in this title. The events take place shortly after the base game with action being the focus...this is not a bad thing as you still get the great gaming mechanics of the original with a few interesting puzzles. It is a must play as a new chapter in one of the greatest FPS titles is always worth it considering it is done to a high standard.
Not the best out of the two Episodes, but necessary to continue to Episode Two which is a must play. It's a great experience nonetheless. Get it!
An Amazing game. Around 1/6 of the length of HL2, but still great. The plot stays true to the other games, and the game is great overall. Probably not as good as HL2 though.
Отличное продолжение истории рассказанной в Half Life 2. 10/10.
Sequel to Half Life 2, now with more waifu.

Mini-recenzja do Half Life 2 już popełniona, więc krótko o pierwszym z dodatków, dorzucanych do Orange Box'a.
Episode One to przede wszystkim kilka wkurzających mini-misji, które trzeba wykonać, żeby zdobyć to upranione 100%.
Fabuła ciekawa, kilka zabawnych momentów jak zwykle się trafia.
Przyznam szczerze, że seria Half Life 2, a przynajmniej główny wątek i ten dodatek, to jedne z tych gier, przy których przedzieranie się przez ukryte lokacje sprawia najwięcej frajdy :)

Также, как и оригинальный Half-Life 2, Episode One держит игрока в непрерывном увлечении, с помощью идеально выверенного темпа игры и постоянных сюрпризов и изобретений. Продолжение стало отличным напоминанием о том, чего можно достичь с помощью эпизодического контента, если подходить к нему правильно. В 2006 году игра получила награды: «Лучшая графика», «Лучший экшн», третье место из десяти лучших игр года, третье место в номинациях «Визуальный ряд года», «Лучший звук в игре» и «Золотой Мозг» за персонажа зомбайна, победившего в номинации «Объединение злодеев и зомби для получения награды за лучших зомбированных злодеев».
Sorta short, but this Episode provides a great story to what happens after the Combine's squeeze has been lifted.
Good "3-hours" addon with fluid gameplay! 8/10
It probably my least favoriate out of all of the half-lifes but its still good enough to be considered a half-life

and the epic saga continues! not only it's the continuation of the story, but it also contains some more in-depht look of the universe presented, including on the items and characters seen in the "episode zero". It may be short and simple, but it is still a nice addition to the collection. in a way, it is also an intro to the episode two.
Much Better!!

Первый эпизод Half-Life 2 это практически идеальный аддон для шедевральной игры, в котором минимум инноваций соседничает со все тем же восхитительным геймплеем. Не зря многие считают первый эпизод отдельной игрой. Усилий разработчики вложили по максимуму и у них снова, в 2006 году получилось навести улыбку на лица всех фанатов серии. Всего один новый враг и одна новая технология HDR в первом эпизоде послужили отличным примером того, что когда талантливые люди делают с душой свое дело, у них все получается на все 100! Безупречный аддон и маст хев всем фанатам и просто любителям хороших игр.

Оценка 8,8/10
So you go play in these underground tunnels with Alex for about an hour than you get out and die in a train.

While this mainly sets the scene for Episode 2, it's still really fun. It's really short as well, and I managed 3 hours to complete it, and another 3 hours to complete the game a second time getting all the achievements. Nonetheless, you really should get this for the story setup for Episode 2 (which is amazing).

The first mini sequel to Half-Life 2 starts at the exact moment where Half-Life 2 left off, and follows Gordon and Alyx's escape from City 17. It features the same addictive gameplay throughout the episode, this time more focused on puzzle oriented situations.
Burn zombie, burn!
Чёткий сюжет про взрыве реактора из Цитадели. Потрясающая игра года!

Этот эпизод Half-life лично у меня ассоциируется с тёмно-оранжевым цветом,с запахом дыма и звуками обваливаюзихся зданий.Многие считают этот эпизод излишне коротким.Мне же он нравится как раз таки тем,что в нём нет ничего лишнего.Он полон тьмы и чувства разрухи.Цитадель пала,зомби,хедкрабов и других обитателей умирающего города больше никто не сдерживает,город держится,как говорится,"на соплях",и в этом эпизоде вам через всё это придётся пройти.
big hands pulls you from the wreck

Episode One continues the events right after Half-Life 2 taking Gordon and Alyx through the almost ashes of City 17 having to re-enter the citadel and combat against the remaining combine and zombies whilst trying to escape. It’s an extension to the story so if you played Half-Life 2 you need to get this to continue the plot with that it’s pretty much the same game with some new enemies and locations. Definitely has some scary vibes at times and intense in several other occasions as well pretty fun and short. 

+Not even $10 and is practically free on sale
+Kinda short about 1-2 hours long much shorter than Half-Life 2 and Episode 2
+Lots of intense moments having to kill endless waves of zombies waiting for an elevator in the dark, lead civilians through combine infested warehouses, infinite antlion spawns, etc. just a lot of intense moments and fun gameplay.
+2 new enemies
+Main menu gives a nice recap and explanation of the current situation
+Get to used the upgraded gravity gun again
+Lots of zombies, lots of darkness and scary moments definitely has a bit of a creepy/horror vibe to the portion after the citadel. Which is even better when you’re in pitch black corridors with no lights and your flashlight is limited.
+Cool ending and final boss
+Alyx has limited health making you have to protect her yet again making the gameplay more intense at times, also her AI pathing is nice as she’ll always seem to catch up to you if you run ahead unlike most NPCs who walk like a legless grandma. Also she kills enemies really fast which is always awesome.
+Steam cloud


-Although Dr.Kleiner's explanation on the main menu is nice it would also be nice if you could mute or pause him as he never shuts up and is on loop
-Remote Play doesn’t work there is no multiplayer aspect to this game not even local multiplayer
-Buying this game gives you Half-Life 2 Deathmatch for free which is a separate game bundled along with this. The multiplayer for that is completely dead as you can expect for a pointless multiplayer released over a decade ago. It’s just not worth playing whatsoever because it’s completely dead. Would be nice if you could opt out of getting it bundled and only buy the episode. 

I really liked this Half-Life. Just the dark and creepy zombie infested areas with Alyx was really cool and the game has a lot of intense moments. Not very long which is nice but kinda wish it was a bit longer. The combine section near the end gets somewhat tiresome but the ending makes up for it and is pretty cool. A nice conutionation a stupid game bundled along with it yes mate.
Excellente suite de Half Life 2 qui n'a pas pris une ride
one of the greatest games of all time

Made by God: 2 Episode One.

Half-Life 2 Episode One ist eine gut Ergänzung die die Handlung weiterführt
Ich werde hier nicht unbedingt viel schreiben weil ich das Hauptspiel bereits empfohlen habe.
STORY:
Die Handlung fängt etwas iritierend an, was abr später erklärt wird. Ans sich htte man in dieser Sielzeit mehr Handlung unterbringen können.
SPIELZEIT:
Die Spielzeit beträgt etwa 4 Stunden, was für eine kleine Ergänzung völlig ausreicht..
SOUND:
Der Sound hat mich in Episode One doch ziemlich beeintruckt wie auch schon im Hauptspiel. Das Knarschen von Bauteilen machte mir schon manchmal etwas Angst.
FAZIT:
An sich ist Episode One eine gute Ergänzung die kleine Extras liefert. Der Preis von derzeit 6,99€ ist im Vergleich zum Hauptspiel aber etwas zu hoch. Trotzdem hat Episode One eine Kaufempfehlung von mir! :-)

+ Great story

+ Alyx is the most human NPC ever

- Not as good as HL2 and, definitely, not as spectacular as Episode 2!
Короче, круче оригинала по накалу страстей и дизайну уровней, но краткая, как Иисус.

One of the best in the franchise.

Episode One has as bad a rap as a Half Life game can get. At its best, Ep. 1 is seen as more of the same; at its worst, filler. What Ep. 1 is to Your Humble Narrator is a brilliantly nuanced return to form to the older games in the series: a very minimalist story, but great atmosphere. Add in some superb gameplay, with better level design and smarter puzzles than seen in HL2, and the fact that Alex is to this day the best supporting character in a video game and Episode One has more than earned its place in the Half Life pantheon.
Good Story

More Half-Life 2 for people who want it. The only thing is that the expert pacing from Half-Life 2 isn't quite there. It starts off strong, but ultimately it boils down to crawls from battling with the flashlight battery, keeping Alyx alive, and repetitious escort missions. Luckily, I got this as part of the Orange Box and Portal and Half-Life 2 were worth the price of admission.

9/10 Alyx is almost as sexy as Elizabeth.
again play as gordon freeman and stop the citidel core from overloading. then, try to escape city 17 as you fight the combine. a truely epic game and one of my all time favourites.

This is a fun SHORT game.  I reccomend if you are at all interested in ANY of the Half life games to go ahead and buy the complete package. While they are somewhat dated and ''SHOOT MY PC'!!!' aggrivating, They are great games. This was the first Half Life game I was able to complete. My main complaints are the followers like Alyx. She tends to ride your ass a lot and CAN get you killed because she was right up on you as you were shooting around a corner.

Достойное прямое продолжение оригинальной HL2. Очень динамичный и насыщенный эпизод, хоть и короток. Рекомендую для всех поклонников «халфы»!

I've beaten two original Half-Life games and this wasn't any worse. The problem is that this game took only 3 hours for me to finish and achievements are pretty poor too. Still it succeeded in its most important goal and that is continuation of epic Half-Life story.
A short but great game that follows up nicely on the story Valve wove in Half-Life 2.

Episode One is a direct sequel to Half life 2 , you start trying to escape City 17 which is your goal, but what I feel it is meant to develop your relationship with Alyx  as you don't fully see her personality in the original and what suprises me is although it is still technicially Half Life 2 but it isn't the same gameplay as the original its more of a horror focused and Alyx along as a sidekick the battles are larger , puzzles harder and the A.I. smarter. Although I wanted too play more its just 3 hours long but doesn't lack in story or gamplay...
